text: At the Cavern is a live extended play 45 rpm record released in 1963 by The Big Three. It was released on Decca Records as DFE 8552 in mono and reached #6 in the UK EP charts in December 1963.Brown, Tony, Jon Kutner & Neil Warwick, The Complete Book of the British Charts: Singles and Albums, Omnibus Press, London, 2002 The liner notes are by Bob Wooler, the DJ at The Cavern Club in Liverpool where this live recording was recorded.The Big Three, At the Cavern, Decca Records, DFE 8552, mono, 1963 ==Track listing== ==Personnel== * Johnny Hutchinson – drums * Johnny Gustafson – bass guitar * Brian Griffiths – electric guitar * Noel Walker – producer * Terry Johnson – recording engineer ==References== Category:1963 EPs Category:The Big Three (English band) albums Category:Decca Records EPs Category:EPs by British artists Category:Pop rock EPs Category:Live EPs
title: At the Cavern
